products.title: Azurite Chenille Grey Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Azurite chenille grey roman blind in grey. Made to measure from 20.63 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft grey roman blind fuses a plush, luxuy feel in a contemporary grey tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. 
 
At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain!
 
 Product id: db-rom1138 fabric colour: grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Azurite Chenille Grey Curtain
products.metadescription: Azurite chenille grey curtain in grey. Made to measure from 29.04 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft grey fabric fuses a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary grey tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. These curtains will look beautiful in cool, contemporary spaces & are perfect for adding shade and texturing to grey styled interiors. 
 
All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk. We are so proud of the finish and quality, all their curtains come with a free 5-year guarantee for additional peace of mind that you are investing in a something that will stand the test of time. This fabric is also available as a roman blind.
